data.description: The flow is the amount of material that needs to be extruded over a specific amount of time and is based on the filament diameter and print speed. The flow is always set to 100%, which means that the extruded amount of filament will match the calculated amount.
data.hints: - This setting is not usually changed, as the calculation is done automatically, but it can be useful when printing with experimental materials.
data.notes: It is not advised to increase the flow to compensate for under extrusion. This will only work temporarily and wonâ€™t solve the underlying cause.
